{{Description|A mystic plant that grows in the heart of the forest. Seems to be sentient.}}
The {{Location Intro|description=<p>[[Offering]] [[Dendro Sigil]]s to the Tree of Dreams will increase [[Vanarana's Favor]] level and provide rewards.</p>}}

Access to the Tree of Dreams is unlocked by completing ''[[Trees and Dreams]]'', which is available after completing [[Aranyaka]]: Part II - [[Dream Nursery]], Part 1: ''[[The World of Aranara]]''.
